I would recommend "Pride and Prejudice" (1998) to someone who enjoys romantic dramas with strong female leads.

The movie is set in England during the early 19th century, and follows the story of Elizabeth Bennet, a young woman from a lower-class family, who falls in love with Mr. Darcy, a wealthy gentleman from an upper-class family, who has initially rejected Elizabeth's advances.

As the story unfolds, Elizabeth and Darcy find themselves entangled in a series of events that test their resolve and ultimately determine whether they will be able unbreakable bond and live happily ever after
